overview: Messe Noire includes the band’s victorious shows in Warsaw, Poland on October 8, 2016 and Brutal Assault 2016 as well as The Satanist cinematic archive featuring all official videos associated with the band’s globally successful record of the same name.  "Messe Noire: Live Satanist" recorded at Progresja, Warsaw, Poland on October 8th, 2016  "Messe Noire: Live Assault (Official Bootleg)" recorded at Brutal Assault Festival, Jaromer, Czech Republic on August 13th, 2016

production_companies.name: Metal Blade, Nuclear Blast, Wild Rags, Pagan, Avantgarde Music, Regain, Century Media, Mystic Production

title: Behemoth: Messe Noire:  Live Satanist
